detaileddescription.para:

input
: Combination of input arguments.
rvert_crossing
: Reducible vertex in the related channel (t,p,a) for r=(a,p,t), needed to apply symmetry transformations that map between channels a <--> t.

memberdef.name: update_grid

detaileddescription.para: Interpolate the vertex to updated grid when rescaling the grid to new flow parameter Lambda.

Interpolate the vertex to updated grid.
k
frequencyGrid_in
new frequency grid
rvert4data
vertex to be interpolated can be different from *this, so we can backup a vertex and interpolate the backup
Optimizes the frequency grids and updates the grids accordingly
K1-functionality Apply the frequency symmetry relations (for the independent components) to update the vertex after bubble integration.
K2 functionality Apply the frequency symmetry relations (for the independent components) to update the vertex after bubble integration.
K3 functionality Apply the frequency symmetry relations (for the independent components) to update the vertex after bubble integration.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string identifier, const rvert< Q > &rvert_this, const rvert< Q > &rvert_crossing) const
memberdef.name: check_symmetries

detaileddescription.para:
This function is defined if the flag DEBUG_SYMMETRIES is defined. It iterates over all vertex entries and checks whether symmetry relations are fulfilled. Deviations from the symmetry relation are stored in a file.
identifier
string to distinguish the filename of the stored
spin
spin component (currently 0 or 1)
rvert_this
rvert of the related vertex with spin 0 (contains symmetry reduced sector of vertex)
rvert_crossing
rvert that is related to rvert_this via crossing symmetry
Iterates over all vertex components and compares with the value obtained from application of the symmetry relations
Q

memberdef.argsstring: (const rvert< Q > &rvert_this, const rvert< Q > &rvert_crossing, const rvert< Q > &vertex_half2_samechannel, const rvert< Q > &vertex_half2_switchedchannel, int spin) const
memberdef.name: symmetry_expand

detaileddescription.para:
Iterates over all vertex components and fills in the value obtained from the symmetry-reduced sector
Q
